verses.name: Psalms 74:17
verses.text: Thou hast set all the borders of the earth: thou hast made summer and winter.

verses.name: Psalms 74:18
verses.text: Remember this, that the enemy hath reproached, O Lord, and that the foolish people have blasphemed thy name.

verses.name: Psalms 74:19
verses.text: O deliver not the soul of thy turtledove unto the multitude of the wicked: forget not the congregation of thy poor for ever.

verses.name: Psalms 74:20
verses.text: Have respect unto the covenant: for the dark places of the earth are full of the habitations of cruelty.

verses.name: Psalms 74:21
verses.text: O let not the oppressed return ashamed: let the poor and needy praise thy name.
